ngiemboon: Tè kwɛ́ legwaʼá shú té kwɛ́ ség.
en: Don’t attach your shelf without attaching ours.

ngiemboon: À lɔɔn shʉ́a lepfo, á ná ségè.
en: If he splits the cola, he gives us ours.

ngiemboon: Akème nkùnkùʼ yɔɔn gie m pfɛ́ɛ lɔɔn, á lʉme lê shʉ́ŋ.
en: This piece of cane that I am sucking is very sweet.

ngiemboon: Etsaŋ lɔɔn tè gie e pǔ ńtʉ tɛʼ wɔ́, mé le náa shʉ̀ŋ ntsɔ̀ʼ nda ŋàg wɔ́.
en: It is when the judgment is serious that it is sent to the supreme court.
